name: Nehru Park New Delhi
reviews: It is the best park in New Delhi with 2.78 kms long jogging synthetic track. Having slopes in the path. Popular and well maintained one. Thanks to NDMC for maintaining it in a very professional manner. Great job indeed. Frequented by ‚Ä¶

I really like Nehru Park. It‚Äôs a great place for an evening run, and I took my friends and their dog along too. The park is clean, peaceful, and has plenty of space to walk or relax. Joey the doggo also enjoyed it a lot. A nice spot to unwind and get some fresh air.

A beautiful park in the middle of Delhi, perfect for walks, runs and picnics. It's very well maintained with a variety of trees, groves, and even some small water bodies. The big shady trees provide some respite from the sun so you can enjoy the flowers when they're in bloom.
